items.text: short and into his ribs. Gets on his toes and glances to fine leg
items.postText: Mushfiqur'sSOUL: "I'm still scarred by nazimuddins innings and that was what like 6 years ago?"
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: short of a length outside off, punched to long-on off the back foot
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: length ball on middle stump, swept with the turn to deep square
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: length on leg stump, whipped to deep midwicket's left off the back foot
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: full on middle stump, driven to long-on off the front foot
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: fingertip from Hetmyer who is flying to his right from midwicket. He can't get there though. Tamim doesn't get to the pitch of this middle stump ball as he looks to flick and it floats up and then gets down to long-on
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: short of a length on off stump, backs away and stabs into the off side
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: short ball in the corridor, chops it down to third man
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: launched over point with full control. Short and wide outside off and this is easy for Tamim. Slashes effectively from underneath
items.shortText: Paul to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: short on the hips, swivels and pulls between deep square and fine leg
items.shortText: Paul to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: cut uppishly towards third man. Short ball cramps him in the corridor
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: short and outside off. Caresses it towards third man but point sprints across to his right to stop this
items.shortText: Paul to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short ball at the stumps. Pulled to deep square's right
items.shortText: Paul to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: is there bat on that? We'll find out with the review. Bishoo gets this to dip and turn in at Tamim, who is pressing forward with hard hands. It's lobbed off the pad, past the keeper's grasp and then been taken at slip. Was there bat before all of the action? There was a sound...but it was the sound of ball hitting forearm and sliding onto the pad. He's also struck outside off for the lbw decision. Not out. Review lost.
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: tossed up on a length at off stump, he shuffles across and winds up to swing. But is forced to tap with a straight bat
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: floated up at a length again, watchfully defended down the pitch
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length ball sliding in at leg stump, flicked hurriedly to square lge
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: tossed up outside off, 74kph. Shuffles again and closes the face on this. Gets the flick to square leg
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: steps out and toe-ends it down the pitch after meeting it on the full. Bishoo fires in a throw after picking this up and makes him skip back into the crease
items.postText: Bishoo completely had Tamim in that over, with his tantalising dipping deliveries.
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper's right off the toe-end
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, flashy drive attempted on the up. Thick outside edge to third man's right
items.shortText: Paul to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: short and wide outside off, shapes to cut but this zips back into the corridor and climbs too as he tries to connect
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: length ball on middle stump, jabbed to mid-on on the rise
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: length on middle stump, driven on the rise to mid-on's right
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: short of a length outside off, mistimed cut to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Paul to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run
